params._token: address of token used for staking and rewards

depositParachainStake(uint32,bytes,uint2.details: Called by the staker on the EVM compatible parachain that hosts the Tellor controller contracts. The staker will call this function and pass in the parachain account identifier, which is used to enable that account to report values over on the oracle consumer parachain.

params._account: The account identifier of the reporter on the oracle consumer parachain.
params._amount: The amount of tokens to stake.
params._paraId: The parachain ID of the oracle consumer parachain.

getOwner().details: Returns the address of the contract owner.

getParachainStakerDetails(uint32,address.details: Returns info relevant to parachain staking

params._paraId: is the parachain ID of the oracle consumer parachain

returns._0: bytes account on consumer parachain enabled to report by staker

getParachainStakerInfo(uint32,address).details: Returns all information about a staker

params._paraId: is the parachain ID of the oracle consumer parachain

returns._2: uint256 current amount locked for withdrawal

getTokenAddress().details: Returns the address of the token used for staking

returns._0: address of the token used for staking

init(address).details: Allows the owner to initialize the ParachainGovernance contract address

requestParachainStakeWithdraw(uint32,uin.details: Allows a staker on EVM compatible parachain to request withdrawal of their stake for a specific oracle consumer parachain.

params._amount: The amount of tokens to withdraw.
params._paraId: The unique identifier of the oracle consumer parachain.

slashParachainReporter(uint256,uint32,ad.details: Slashes a reporter and transfers their stake amount to the given recipient Note: this function is only callable by the governance address.

params._paraId: is the parachain ID of the oracle consumer parachain
params._recipient: is the address receiving the reporter's stake
params._reporter: is the address of the reporter being slashed

returns._0: _slashAmount uint256 amount of token slashed and sent to recipient address

withdrawParachainStake(uint32).details: Allows a staker to withdraw their stake.

params._paraId: Identifier of the oracle consumer parachain.
